channel.title: Going for 80 dung
channel.description:
And i have a few questions:
1. I'm going rev hunting, which should i get?
Rapier Longsword Maul (Probably wont get this, but ill put it here anyways, because you never know :P)
2. How many tokens will i have at level 80 if i never bought anything?
3. If i loose the weapon i get, do i have to buy it again? Or reclaim or something? What a coincidence icreate, right when you pm me, i start doing this.. (I swer legit <333)
And vote on the poll :P
So far, leaning more on the rapier side.
Also ill make this a proggy thread (Thread might die soon, but oh well)
Started off yesterday with 32 dungeonering Ended with 38 in about 3-4 hrs Started off today with 38 dungeonering So far, lvl 44, NOT close to 45, with about 8 and a half hours or so of time. Ended with 46 in about 8 hours Started off today with 44 dungeonering So far, lvl 48, not close 49, with about 3 hours of time.

item.title: Going for 80 dung
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:31, topic:392898”]I just had to post this…

sdgfdg.png775×699

Though that is NOT mine, friend payed me $40 to bot his acc (Bought the script for $10, profit?) But this was the exp after one dungeon.[/quote]
Its a good script, bought it myself a little while ago. I’ve left it on all night a few times by accident (after boting 6-7 hours that day) and never got caught, so imo. Flawless

item.title: Going for 80 dung
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:27, topic:392898”]Chaotic Rapier + Dragon Defender = DAMN GOOD. Think of it this way:

In 30 seconds, the Rapier can hit 15 times, the CLS 10.

Rapier = 101str x 15 = 1515 total str bonus worth.
CLS = 120 str x 10 = 1200 total str bonus worth.

With the dragon defender, accuracy is greatly boosted as well as strength, so Rapier = all around better.[/quote]
Well who am i to defy math?

K, now im not favouring the cls, ill let the votes choose for me

Read full topic

item.title: Going for 80 dung
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Chaotic Rapier + Dragon Defender = DAMN GOOD. Think of it this way:

In 30 seconds, the Rapier can hit 15 times, the CLS 10.

Rapier = 101str x 15 = 1515 total str bonus worth.
CLS = 120 str x 10 = 1200 total str bonus worth.

With the dragon defender, accuracy is greatly boosted as well as strength, so Rapier = all around better.

Read full topic

item.title: Going for 80 dung
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Rich, post:25, topic:392898”][quote author=Rich link=topic=490070.msg3584175#msg3584175 date=1304034899]
Longsword is pointless unless you’re planning on doing bosses, it’s only considered better than the rapier when against monsters with high defense.

For all around use the rapier is the way to go.
[/quote][/quote]
Well thats the thing, see, revs have insanely high defence (For me at least). Higher hits and more accuracy is what i need.

Read full topic

item.title: Going for 80 dung
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:23, topic:392898”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=490070.msg3584232#msg3584232 date=1304038278]

Thank you for the feedback all!

So far, rapier is getting more votes, but im leaning toward the longsword, because imo it looks better and its stronger, even if it is slower…

Chances are i wont get maul tbh…

So the real question is between rapier and longsword…
[/quote]Notice how a majority of people have rapiers. Its because the longswords suck.

Isn’t it that rapiers are just faster, but weaker?
Dunno though, still debating, but i have lots of time to think before i hit 80

Rapier is still pretty strong though. I’d stick with rapier.[/quote]
Yeah… i guess.

EDIT:
Just used a stat comparer, man the longsword is a ton stronger, and higher attack bonuses is what im looking for (str bonuses to ofc), speed isnt really the problem… still dont know…

Read full topic

item.title: Going for 80 dung
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:6, topic:392898”][quote author=Rich link=topic=490070.msg3583409#msg3583409 date=1303961681]

  1. Rapier
  2. Close to 200k, 10 xp = 1 token - You’ll need at least 2 million XP for the 200k tokens required to purchase the rapier.
  3. You’ll have to get all the tokens again.

Keep in mind the rapier degrades after 10 hours of combat (from when it’s fully charged), and to recharge it from 0% costs 2 million GP or 200k GP and 20k tokens.
[/quote]
I know that part, but one thing on that…

Lets say you fight a demon for 15 seconds.

Do i have 9:59:45 left on it?

Is that what its like?[/quote]
Yes, 10 hours of combat.

Read full topic
